lead_paragraph: SOLIN--Dr. Jerome, age 89, died Sunday, June 26, 2016. Raised in Bayonne, he practiced dentistry in New Jersey and New York for 60 years. A United States Navy veteran of WWII, he graduated from University of Virginia and NYU Dental School. At the age of 40, he ran the first of 65 marathons. He was a collector and authority of jazz. Dr. Solin was preceded in death by daughters Nina and Alexa. Survivors include his wife of 59 years, artist Trudy Solin, son Dr. Seth Solin and daughter-in-law Janet Poon Solin and granddaughter Julia; son David Solin and granddaughters Serena and Alana. Graveside service on Friday, July 1 at 10:15am at Beth El Cemetery, Paramus, NJ. Contributions in Jerry's memory to Jazz Society at Lincoln Center. 1/3
